briefTitle: Intravenous Thyroxine for Heart-Eligible Organ Donors

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Declared dead by neurologic criteria (brain dead)
* Authorization for organ donation and research
* On one or more vasopressors and/or inotropes

Exclusion Criteria:

* Brain death declared more than 24 hours prior
* Only vasopressor is vasopressin
* Weight \< 45 kg (100 lbs)
* Known coronary artery disease or history of myocardial infarction
* Known valvular heart disease
* Prior sternotomy or cardiac surgery
* Donor at VA hospital
* Received intravenous or oral thyroxine within past month
* Known HIV+ status
* Other reason donor is unable to receive study drug (determined by on-site personnel)

outcomeMeasures.title: Heart Transplanted
outcomeMeasures.description: Whether heart is transplanted into living recipient

outcomeMeasures.title: Graft Function
outcomeMeasures.description: 30-day graft survival of hearts transplanted from study donors, obtained from SRTR recipient registry

outcomeMeasures.title: Time Till Off Vasopressors
outcomeMeasures.description: Time in hours from randomization to when weaned off vasopressors (except vasopressin)

outcomeMeasures.title: Weaned Off Vasopressors
outcomeMeasures.description: Weaned off vasopressors within twelve hours

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to Order Echo
outcomeMeasures.description: Time till hemodynamic stability permits ordering initial echocardiogram

outcomeMeasures.title: Ejection Fraction
outcomeMeasures.description: Left ventricular ejection fraction measured on first echocardiography

outcomeMeasures.title: Lungs Transplanted
outcomeMeasures.description: Whether the lungs were transplanted into a living recipient

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Organs Transplanted
outcomeMeasures.description: Total number of organs transplanted (incl. lungs, liver, kidneys, heart, pancreas)
